meanings.sent1: The pinecone had a strong, resinous smell.
meanings.sent2: The old furniture had a shiny, resinous finish.
meanings.sent3: The resinous tree sap made the squirrel stick to the branch comically.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a resinous quality that stuck in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The resinous texture of the pine bark made it easy to grip.

meanings.sent1: The table was sticky and resinous to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The artist's hands were covered in a sticky, resinous substance.
meanings.sent3: The resinous paint dripped down the canvas in a messy pattern.
meanings.sent4: The resinous coating on the floor made it slippery like ice.
meanings.sent5: The resinous surface of the sculpture glistened in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The violin had a warm, resinous tone when played.
meanings.sent2: The candle emitted a sweet, resinous scent when lit.
meanings.sent3: The resinous nature of the glue made it difficult to remove.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had a shiny, resinous look after using the special treatment.
meanings.sent5: The resinous flavor of the honey lingered on his tongue.
